long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stick War: Battle of the Sticks 🏹

Immerse yourself in a world where stick figures clash for supremacy in an epic battle for dominance. Crafted by the skilled developers Jason Whitham and Brock White, Stick War offers a strategic gaming experience, challenging players to lead their stick figure army to victory, manage resources, and conquer territories in a visually distinctive setting.

Game Controls 🎮

Master the controls for strategic warfare:

Mouse: Control unit movements, select actions, and interact with the game interface.
How to Play ⚔️

Build Your Army: Recruit stick figure units, including miners, swordsmen, archers, and more.

Gather Resources: Manage your economy by sending miners to collect valuable resources like gold.

Strategic Warfare: Plan and execute strategic attacks to conquer territories and defeat opposing stick figure armies.

Upgrade Units: Use collected resources to upgrade and enhance the abilities of your units. 🌟

Play more games on the top-left menu.
Play on web version by clicking on web version button.
